pr_title: HDDS-3632. starter scripts can't manage Ozone and HDFS datandodes on the same machine

timeline.message: HDDS-3632. HddsDatanodeService cannot be started if HDFS datanode running in same machine with same user.

timeline.bodyText: Won't these privileged files also conflict?  (I don't think this branch is hit with current code, though.)
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: Same comment as @adoroszlai. Should we change the filenames for secure cluster also?

timeline.bodyText:
